articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: Inside the Oval Office with Donald Trump and Keir Starmer
articles.description: "I've never been into the Oval Office and had a situation where a president would answer so many questions from journalists," Sky's political editor Beth Rigby says.
articles.content:
Wow. That was a lot.
I had two tactics going in: one - smile at Donald Trump, try to catch his eye because then he might ask you for a question, and I did get called.
And two, wear something bright so he sees you in the sea of grey. Well, that worked... [1741 chars]

With Donald Trump, it's all about relationships.
